name: facebook-dewaller-extension
description: Removes disruptive facebook navigation to improve logged-out facebook browsing experience. Makes it easier to use Facebook with Tor/OrBot/etc, Incognito browsing, or any other logged-out browsing context
author: Rikki Schulte

scripts.release: echo 'Note: if you didnt bump both package.json and manifest.json versions this will fail' && yarn sign
